Most Illustrious Sir Piratini, December 27, 1838.

Concerning the prompt reception of the enclosed official letter addressed to citizen Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima, I beg Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency Secretariat of the Treasury in Piratini, December 27, 1838. Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division. Domingos José de Almeida
